alert.note: Alert for Jefferson; Orleans; Plaquemines; St. Bernard (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued March 11 at 7:22PM CST until March 11 at 8:00PM CST by NWS New Orleans
info.description: The National Weather Service in New Orleans has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern St. Bernard Parish in southeastern Louisiana... Orleans Parish in southeastern Louisiana... North central Jefferson Parish in southeastern Louisiana... Northwestern Plaquemines Parish in southeastern Louisiana... * Until 800 PM CST. * At 722 PM CST, a severe thunderstorm was located over Bridge City, or near Marrero, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * Locations impacted include... New Orleans, Metairie, Chalmette, Marrero, Harvey, Avondale, East New Orleans, Timberlane, Belle Chasse, Jefferson, Gretna, Harahan, Westwego, Woodmere, Elmwood, Violet, Terrytown, Meraux, Bridge City and River Ridge. This includes the following Interstates... Interstate 10 in Louisiana between mile markers 226 and 251. Interstate 510 between mile markers 1 and 3. Interstate 610 between mile markers 1 and 4. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
